backend/main.mo: Actor with access-controlled user profile storage supporting get and save operations keyed by caller principal.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a quick-add item behavior to related frontend files, components, and test ID.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting page metadata and loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component handling print mode, view switching between calculator and daily totals, and layout structure.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button using Internet Identity with login/logout handling and loading states.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/Balan: Daily totals UI showing selectable days, revenue summary, and per‑item quantity table.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/hooks: React hook computing available ledger days, selected day totals, and aggregated per‑item quantities from saved bills.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/ledge: LocalStorage-based daily ledger utilities for saving, loading, and aggregating bill totals and item quantities.
frontend/src/features/calculator/catalog: Defines the CatalogItem type and a predefined list of menu items with prices and categories.
Provides number and currency formatting helpers for INR values.
frontend/src/features/calculator/lineIte: Helpers for normalizing labels, matching catalog items to line items, and computing added quantities.
frontend/src/features/calculator/Predefi: React component that displays searchable, categorized catalog items and allows adding, creating, deleting, and marking items out of stock.
frontend/src/features/calculator/PrintBi: Print-only component that renders a formatted bill with line items and totals for printing.
frontend/src/features/calculator/savedBi: LocalStorage-based utilities to save, load, list, and clear saved bill records.
frontend/src/features/calculator/TotalAm: Main calculator page managing line items, catalog interactions, totals calculation, bill saving, and printing.
frontend/src/features/calculator/types.t: Type definitions for line items, calculator state, and calculation breakdown.
frontend/src/features/calculator/utils.t: Provides number parsing, clamping, and functions to compute line totals, subtotals, and full tax/discount breakdowns.
frontend/src/features/print/PrintViewPag: Loads a saved bill by URL ID and manages automatic print flow, error handling, and post-print completion UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for login, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom color variables, dark mode values, and print-specific styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color variables, custom radii, and loads additional plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current version, feature set, architectural notes, and requirements for a calculator app with catalog, billing, daily totals, and themed UI. Tracks print-flow behavior, item-handling rules, and other ongoing design constraints.
